title: Life Insurance & Annuities
description: Life insurance policies and annuity contracts that could help fund care

sections.title: Life Insurance & Annuities Assessment
sections.help_text: Add any life insurance cash value or annuities that could help fund care.

info_boxes.message: üí° Only include policies with cash value or annuities you can access. Term life insurance (without cash value) doesn't need to be listed here.

sections.title: Life Insurance
sections.help_text: Cash value from permanent life insurance policies

fields.label: Do you have life insurance with cash value?
fields.help: Permanent life insurance (whole life, universal life) builds cash value over time. Term life insurance does not.

fields.label: Current Cash Value
fields.help: The amount you could access by borrowing against or surrendering the policy. Check your latest policy statement or contact your insurer.

fields.label: Death Benefit / Face Value (Optional)
fields.help: The amount paid to beneficiaries upon death. This helps us understand the full scope of your policy.

fields.label: Monthly Premium Payment
fields.help: Your monthly premium cost. This helps us factor ongoing insurance expenses into your care budget.

fields.label: Primary Beneficiary (Optional)
fields.help: Who receives the death benefit? This context may be relevant for estate and care planning.

sections.title: Annuities
sections.help_text: Annuity contracts that provide income or have surrender value

fields.label: Do you have any annuities?
fields.help: Annuities are insurance contracts that provide regular income payments or have cash value you can access.

fields.label: Current Annuity Value / Surrender Value
fields.help: The current cash value or surrender value if you were to cash out the annuity today. Check your latest statement.

fields.label: Monthly Income from Annuity
fields.help: If the annuity is already paying you monthly income, enter that amount here.

fields.label: Annuity Details (Optional)
fields.help: Any important details: type of annuity (immediate, deferred, variable, fixed), payout terms, or restrictions on access.

info_boxes.message: ÔøΩÔøΩ If you're receiving annuity income, make sure it's also included in your Income Assessment for accurate monthly projections.
